title: Giro d’Italia Stage 13: Pedersen Outmuscles Van Aert in Brutal Hilltop Finale, Del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink
content:
Isaac del Toro expands gap over Juan Ayuso with bonuses at the Red Bull intermediate and at the finish line. Who can stop the Mercxian Mexican?

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 13: Pedersen Outmuscles Van Aert in Brutal Hilltop Finale, Del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
